1.0.0.name: connect20/singsys_facebook_login
1.0.0.description: This extesnion allows you to login into magento website using their facebook credentials, it also creates the customer account if he is not registered.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
